text: In today's video, we will solve an exercise using React. I will give you a question and you have to solve it. But before solving it, like this video and write Challenge Accepted in the comment section. Let's go to the computer screen. Let's roll the intro. Intro So guys, in today's video, we are going to solve an exercise. I have made a folder here named XOB11 and opened it in VS Code. I will make a readme.md and I will give you a question. And the question is, you have to use an API. You have to use an API and display the data in the form of a card. In the form of a card under a container. Now I will explain to you what it means.
